FuncDef: This command configures a static VRP entry indicating that a specific origin AS is either valid or invalid for a specific IP prefix range. Static VRP entries are stored along with dynamic VRP entries (learned from local cache servers using the RPKI-Router protocol) in the origin validation database of the router. This database is used for determining theorigin-validationstate of IPv4 and/or IPv6 BGP routes received over sessions with theenable-origin-validation command configured.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an IPv4 or IPv6 address with a minimum prefix length value. Values-60 to 3600.
Specifies a keyword meaning the static entry expresses a valid combination of origin AS and prefix range.
Specifies a keyword meaning the static entry expresses an invalid combination of origin AS and prefix range.
